segments.text: So John , have you ever been to China before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t . This is the first time I have been to China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you travelled to many other countries ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , I have never been to an Asian country before but I have visited many countries in Europe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about America ? Have you ever been to the United States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I haven ’ t been to the states but I have been to Canada .
segments.speaker: S2
